name: You, the Sun
description:
Status: Alpha Build, prologue

We all remember our first love, how it began, how it felt, and how it ended.

But what happens when our first love doesn't have an ending? What happens when there are still things left unsaid?

A bit of history: "You, the Sun" is a short story I wrote in my freshman year of college as part of a creative writing final. This is a piece that holds a big place in my heart, as it's the first piece I shared with others after a plagiarism incident that cost me most of my social life and mental well-being. It's not a perfect story, nor do I expect it to be, but I hope the story of Oliver and Josephine will bring at least one smile to your face.
